summary: This document is an arrest sheet from the U.S. Marshals Service detailing the arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell on July 2, 2020. It includes biographical information, medical conditions, and charges related to the enticement of minors for prostitution and transportation of minors for sexual activity.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Ghislaine Maxwell is the subject of the arrest sheet, detailing her biographical information and medical conditions at the time of arrest.

events.title: Arrest of Ghislaine Maxwell
events.description: Ghislaine Maxwell was arrested on charges related to the enticement of minors for prostitution and transportation of minors for sexual activity.

locations: 338 East Washington Rd, Bradford, New Hampshire
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell was born on December 25, 1961, in France.
She was arrested on July 2, 2020, at her residence in Bradford, New Hampshire.
The charges against her include enticement of minors for prostitution and transportation of minors for sexual activity.
At the time of arrest, she exhibited several medical conditions including coughing up blood and night sweats.
The document indicates that she had thoughts of suicide and hurting herself or others.
